name: Mushroom with a Gun
description:
Mushroom with a Gun

Play as Mycol the mushroom and turn the world colourful with your mushroom gun!

Controls:
    WASD to move
    Mouse and right click to aim and shoot
    Spacebar to reload (when standing on colourful ground)
    Esc or P to pause

This game is a shmup assignment for the Uppsala University Game Design Programme. Group members: Nom, Lilly, Philip, Mirjam, Hannah, Federico.
